comment: Jan is the kindest, most positive professor I've ever had. She IS a real gem. Hard work when it comes to delving into your character and scoring your scene but the work is so worth it! I really feel like I learned so much about myself as an actor and a person in this class. Jan deserves all the gold stars.

Absolutely amazing teacher! One of the best acting instructors I've ever had the pleasure of working with! If you are passionate about acting she is the perfect professor for you. She's incredibly intelligent and knows her stuff. She'll challenge you to be the best you can be. She's also super nice, which is a plus!

Jan is amazing. I never want to miss a class. Every class we grow closer as a group and more inspired as an actor. Her main goal is to help you out, and she is completely understanding and connects to her students.Take her! You won't regret it!
She is fantastic, best professor I have ever had. Every class is an inspiration, and she genuinely cares about her class and her students.  She is incredibly knowledgable. TAKE THIS PROFESSORS.
I loved Jan's class. Never be late... you don't want to miss a minute!

One of the best professors i've ever had.  She is so passionate in everything that she says and everything that she believes in.  She is such a driven artist and wants nothing more than to improve your skills as an actor.  She is comforting and understanding of conflicts and i can honestly say i have grown as a person from knowing her.  Take her!
